title: Create visual apartment layout grid component in Owner Dashboard

requirements.text: Create a visual apartment layout grid component (DaireGorunumu.tsx) in the frontend that displays all apartments in an interactive grid/card layout, showing apartment name/number (daireAdi) on each card

quotes: Daire Görünümü - En son görselleştirme  bunu da yap

acceptanceCriteria: Component displays apartments in a responsive grid layout (e.g., 3-4 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile)
Each apartment is rendered as a card showing daireAdi prominently
Grid uses consistent spacing and styling matching OwnerDashboard patterns
Component integrates with useListApartments React Query hook to fetch apartment data
Loading and empty states are handled with appropriate Turkish messages

requirements.text: Integrate the DaireGorunumu component into the OwnerDashboard page (frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboard.tsx) as a new section titled 'Daire Görünümü' positioned after the existing apartment management section
acceptanceCriteria: New section appears in OwnerDashboard with Turkish header 'Daire Görünümü'
Section is positioned logically within the dashboard layout with consistent spacing
Visual grid component displays all apartments from the building
Section maintains responsive design consistent with other dashboard sections

requirements.text: Add visual indicators to apartment cards showing occupancy status: display a subtle badge or icon indicating whether the apartment is assigned to a user (based on checking if any user's daireId matches the apartment's daireId)
acceptanceCriteria: Each apartment card shows occupancy status (Boş/Dolu) with appropriate visual styling
Occupied apartments display a different badge variant (e.g., success/primary) than vacant ones (e.g., secondary/outline)
Component cross-references apartment data with building user list to determine occupancy
Status indicator uses Turkish labels ('Boş' for vacant, 'Dolu' for occupied)

requirements.text: Implement hover interactions on apartment cards that display additional information in a tooltip or popover, including creation date (olusturmaTarihi) formatted in Turkish locale
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering over an apartment card reveals additional details in a tooltip/popover
Tooltip displays formatted creation date using Turkish date formatting
Hover effect uses smooth transitions consistent with existing UI patterns
Tooltip/popover styling matches shadcn/ui component library patterns

constraints: Do not modify the existing ApartmentsList.tsx table component - create a separate visualization component
Maintain read-only status for files in frontend/src/components/ui and other immutable paths
Use existing React Query hooks (useListApartments, useListBuildingUsers) without modification
Follow the existing Turkish UI text conventions throughout the component
nonGoals: Interactive floor plan editor or drag-and-drop apartment arrangement
Apartment editing or deletion functionality from the visual grid
User assignment interface within the apartment cards
